entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with a few showers beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to flurries in the evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
